issue.title: [C++] Reducing branching in compute/kernels/vector_selection.cc
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13170](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13170). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
`[~wesm]` pointed out that the selection operations can be improved by using a non-branching method in ML and `[~yibocai]` confirmed this.  

<https://lists.apache.org/thread.html/rcffa661ca3526863fc5148ed3c111a72f03b2ce2626178bd83570aa6%40%3Cdev.arrow.apache.org%3E>

 

Evaluate the following
1. Using branch-less approach
1. Check if `BitmapWordReader` can achieve better performance
